allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix parallel processing stack smashing and add tqdm progress bars

- Use spawn context instead of fork to avoid numpy/scipy memory corruption
- Add memory-aware worker limit (_get_safe_parallel_workers)
- Limit thread counts (OMP/MKL/OPENBLAS/NUMEXPR) to avoid contention
- Add tqdm progress bars for parallel and sequential baseline evaluation
- Add error handling in parallel workers (return NaN result instead of crash)
- Fix NUMEXPR_MAX_THREADS warning
